name: Everything's watching in Latenight City
description:
Everything's watching in Latenight City

Welcome to Latenight City. Embarc on your new and suspicious job as a gas station employee in the outsides of the city. Meet the city's residents and try to make an extra buck while you're at it, because filling gas has never been a well-paid job!

Controls

  • Click to select an item.
  • Click & Hold to fill the tank with gas.
  • Click to turn on/off the tire pump.

How to Play

  • Attend all clients' needs.
  • Listen to your clients for clues, so you know what product to sell them. Not everyone will want to buy any product.
  • The more mistakes you make, the less satisfied they'll be.
  • The more you sell them, the less satisfied they'll be.
  • The more time you take, the less satisfied they'll be.
  • If they are unsatisfied, they'll be less willing to buy from you, even if they like the product.

Products

After attending each client, you'll be able to sell them one or more products. Choose wisely, as not everyone will want to buy the same products. Some clients might not even want to buy anything, at all.

  • Job Vacancy Flyer
  • Car Flyer
  • Vacation Flyer

Less is More

This game was entirely made and submitted for the BTP Game Jam, with the theme "Less is More". In Latenight City gas is pricy and the station's pay is only laughable, so the only way to push yourself out of misery is by selling stuff from flyers to the passing clients. You can try selling them everything you have, but you'll probably overwhelm them. The best choice is always to listen to their conversations and figure out what product(s) they're actually willing to buy. Remember, less is more.

Only sound effects were not made by me. They come with a Royalty Free License.

Made in the Godot Engine
